isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - FUEL TRANSFER PUMP (DUAL TANKS); REPLACE

step1.para: Install wheel chocks and open hood
Remove cab skirt panel mounted under left side cab door
Remove left side aerodynamic chassis skirts (if equipped)
Remove left side hood fender extension assembly
Cut tie straps as necessary to reposition air line/wiring bundle
Drain air tanks & disconnect front axle traction control valve air lines and wiring (if equipped)
Remove front axle traction control valve with mount bracket attached (if equipped)
Remove fuel transfer pump (dual tank). Includes cut tie straps as necessary
Install fuel transfer pump (dual tank). Includes install tie straps as necessary
Install front axle traction control valve with mount bracket attached (if equipped)
Connect front axle traction control valve air lines and wiring (if equipped)
Install tie straps as necessary to secure air line/wiring bundle
Install left side hood fender extension assembly
Install left side aerodynamic chassis skirts (if equipped)
Install cab skirt panel mounted under left side cab door
Remove wheel chocks and close hood
